rooms.name: Open-plan Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A spacious combined living room and kitchen area that adheres to Chettinad architectural style, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light. The layout is designed to encourage social interaction in a joint family setting.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet and well-lit home office space, designed for productivity. Positioned near the living area to maintain family connectivity while offering privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom and Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with an attached bathroom. Designed to be inviting for visitors, respecting traditional Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.name: Utility and Storage Room
rooms.description: A functional space for storage of household items, including kitchen supplies and other essentials. Designed with accessibility in mind.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A grand entrance door located on the eastern facade, aligned with Vastu principles for inviting positive energy.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Windows
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling sliding windows integrated into both living and kitchen areas, providing natural light and a seamless indoor-outdoor connection.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A private master bedroom suite for the head of the joint family, featuring an en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet. Designed with Chettinad elegance.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom for children or family members, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space, ideal for extended family members. Maintains a simple yet elegant Chettinad design.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: A shared bathroom designed to serve the family efficiently.
